author: Shahar Avigezer
contents:
הכל התחיל בקריירה הקודמת שלי, כמעצבת UX/UI, כ4 שנים, כשהייתי עובדת עם צוותי פיתוח כאאוטסורס בשלל חברות. העבודה שלהם תמיד הייתה נראית לי כמו קסם 🤩 והיה מתפוצץ לי המח כשהעיצובים שלי קמו לתחייה!
אחרי שסיימתי תקופה בסטודיו שעבדתי בו, נוצרה לי הזדמנות ללמוד קורס פיתוח אנדרואיד בג’ון ברייס. אהבתי את הרעיון של לרכוש סקיל כזה וחשבתי שבטח יהיה לי יותר קל לתקשר עם מפתחות ומפתחים לצידי. בכללי, אני מאמינה שטוב להכיר בצורה בסיסית את מאחורי הקלעים של צוותים שעובדים איתם ביום ביום.
title: איך הפכתי ממעצבת למתכנתת בחצי שנה

author: Shahar Avigezer
contents: The challenge: WFH for weeks, with/without kids, under quarantine. Go, go, go. Well, I’ve past the first week and trust me, I’ve done all the mistakes. Here are some tips to get through. So, how did we come to this? Due to the COVID-19 spreading out, On March 14, Saturday evening, Israel’s prime minister announced a shutdown for schools, pre-schools, cafes, theaters, restaurants and restrict most of the movement. Also, he decided to close down any non-essential businesses and advised workers to stay away from offices.
title: Coronavirus Lockdown: How To Work From Home and Stay Sane

author: Shahar Avigezer
contents: As a Full Stack Developer, I am committed to inspiring and supporting underrepresented groups in the tech industry, particularly women and other backgrounds that are traditionally underrepresented. I believe a diverse and inclusive tech community leads to better solutions. As a mother of three, I understand the unique challenges that come with balancing a career in tech and family life. I want to serve as a role model and mentor for other women and mothers in the industry, and to help create a more inclusive environment for them.
title: About Me

author: Shahar Avigezer
contents: Full stack developer I am a Full Stack Developer with experience in various technologies such as TypeScript, Vue.js, Node.js, GCP, Docker, SQL, Ember.js, Ruby on Rails, Go, AWS, PostgreSQL, Java, Android, Scala, Play, and MongoDB. I have a strong background in both frontend and backend development, with a particular interest in backend logic and API design. I am currently a Software Engineer at Riskified and have previously worked at Snyk, Tailor Brands and Hello Heart Mobile.
